channel.title: Please help! Thanks so much!
channel.description:
I get this whenever I log in or if im lucky and play then try to logout I get it.
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.NullPointerException at OnDemandFetcher.getVersionCount(OnDemandFetcher.java:594) at client.method22(client.java:1155) at client.method54(client.java:3407) at client.loadingStages(client.java:3368) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3792) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2938) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:5648) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]
How can I fix this?

item.title: Please help! Thanks so much!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Is the issue preventing something from happening?
